The PubHive Navigator - Pulse chrome extension let you open, search, highlight the search keywords and create a record from local and global websites.

Designed to help users save time, simplify work, and make sure they never miss important content.

✓ Get on-screen highlighting of search keywords

✓ Create a record from any web page

✓ Automatic logging of all users performed activities

✓ On-demand reporting of activities & created records.

✓ Provide all the combinations for your websites, search keywords, and related information to complete your search, review, and reporting activities.
